title: The Hunger Chronicles: A collection of shorts
description: If you remember nothing else, remember this…The nightmare is here. There is no way out. Even death isn’t an escape because it is death. And chances are it’s already taken everyone you know. …You’re on your own.Just because the face is familiar doesn’t mean they won’t kill you. Hiding won’t help. And it’s past time to run. They’re already here. And hunger is the only thing they feel.
author: Tes Hilaire
